General.Name: M K Land Holdings Bhd
General.Description: M K Land Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the investment and development of properties in Malaysia. It operates through four segments: Property Development, Leisure, Investment Holding, and Education. It develops mixed properties; operates resorts, hotels, and theme parks; and provides educational services, as well as produces solar power. The company is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
